#summary findAllByXXXAndXXX(...)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelClassFunctions Model Class Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [findAll findAll()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with property names.

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset books = model("book").findAllByReleaseYearAndType("#params.year#,#params.type#")>
=
<cfset books = model("book").findAll(where="releaseYear=#params.year# AND type='#params.type#'")>
}}}
